name: (de)populator
description:
you are a spaceship

you must abduct certain houses

don't let the citizens see you

abduct the wrong house,

and they'll look harder

abduct the right house,

they'll forgive you

use your radar to see who's looking,

some look harder than others

a game by whycardboard

designed in gamemaker, art in aseprite

sound effects in renoise

music "subterranean homesick alien" by radiohead
